Summary Note:
The RM is Wagner Kaiser Brandstetter's brother-in-law, having married his's sister. This family connection has strengthened their professional collaboration, allowing for seamless communication and trust.

Family Background: Wagner Kaiser Brandstetter and Emma have been married since 2010. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
In 1994, Wagner finished his secondary school education at Theresianum.
Wagner pursued higher education at University of Vienna, graduating in 1997.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 26 years, Wagner Kaiser Brandstetter brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Wagner Kaiser Brandstetter's first role was as a Junior Trader at Raiffeisen Ware Austria, where he worked diligently from 1999 to 2001 to establish a strong reputation.
In 2001, he moved to Raiffeisen Ware Austria to work as a Senior Trader, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
From 2005 to 2024, he served as a Trading Desk Manager at Raiffeisen Ware Austria, solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 670000 EUR.
He owns villa in Eisenstadt, where he resides. It is worth 1819000 EUR.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns townhouse in Schwechat worth 990000 EUR.

On top of that he inherited a beautiful townhouse in Tulln an der Donau, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 870000 EUR.
He inherited a significant sum of 1220000 EUR from his grandfather, a respected Tech Entrepreneur, in 2009, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In summary, Wagner has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
